variable.name: VERS
variable.description: Form Version

variable.name: BAR3
variable.description: Was assessment with Barthel Stroke Questionnaire within 24-hours of stroke?

variable.name: BAR14
variable.description: Code number of person conducting this interview

variable.name: FSEQNO
variable.description: Form sequence number

variable.name: LINENO
variable.description: Line number

variable.name: BAR3A
variable.description: If yes to BAR3, i.e. assessment with Barthel Stroke Questionnaire was within 24-hours of stroke, number of hours since stroke occurrence?

variable.name: BAR4
variable.description: What was the feeding score on Barthel Stroke Questionnaire?

variable.name: BAR5
variable.description: What was the moving (from wheelchair or regular chair to bed and return) score on Barthel Stroke Questionnaire?

variable.name: BAR6
variable.description: What was the personal toilet score?

variable.name: BAR7
variable.description: What was the getting on and off toilet score on Barthel Stroke Questionnaire?

variable.name: BAR8
variable.description: What was the bathing self score on Barthel Stroke Questionnaire?

variable.name: BAR9
variable.description: What was the walking on level surface score on Barthel Stroke Questionnaire?

variable.name: BAR10
variable.description: What was the ascending and descending stair score on Barthel Stroke Questionnaire?

variable.name: BAR11
variable.description: What was the dressing/undressing score on Barthel Stroke Questionnaire?

variable.name: BAR12
variable.description: What was the continence of bowels score on Barthel Stroke Questionnaire?

variable.name: BAR13
variable.description: What was the controlling the bladder score on Barthel Stroke Questionnaire?

variable.name: BAR15
variable.description: What was the overall score on Barthel Stroke Questionnaire?

variable.name: O_VISIT
variable.description: Indicates the visit number used for selecting study forms or central laboratory data
variable.value: Forms for the one-month follow-up visit
Forms for the three-month follow-up visit
Forms for the six-month follow-up visit
Forms for the nine-month follow-up visit
Forms for the twelve-month follow-up visit
Forms for the fifteen-month follow-up visit
Forms for the eighteen-month follow-up visit
Forms for the twenty-one-month follow-up visit
Forms for the twenty-four-month follow-up visit
Forms for the twenty-seven-month follow-up visit (only performed for a small number of cases to ensure that the patients had an exit visit)

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: Visit number based on follow-up time

variable.name: BAR1FUT
variable.description: Date of most recent stroke?
variable.comment: Variable is in a "number of days since/until randomization date" format; if there is an associated time-of-day variable, it has been incorporated into the variable.

variable.name: BAR2FUT
variable.description: Date of Barthel stroke scale assessment?
variable.comment: Variable is in a "number of days since/until randomization date" format; if there is an associated time-of-day variable, it has been incorporated into the variable.

variable.name: GARNETID
variable.description: Randomized Garnet ID
